TestDrones module¶

Derived class for Test devices.

Should modify for Parrot or DJI drone later.

class TestDrones.BebopDrone(ID, name, device, d2c_port, controller_type, controller_name)¶

Bases: Drone.Drone

Derived class for testing Bebop drones manipulation. May have some difference with original Bebop drones

assign()¶

Assign a drone to the user.

checkIfNetworkRunning()¶

Check if the network with the drone is OK.

checkShutdown()¶

Check if drone shut down.

emergency()¶

Emergenct stop.

estimate_nav_time(destination=None, currentLoc=None)¶

Estimation time of navigation.

getAssignedState()¶

Get FSM state of the drone.

getInfo()¶

Get basic information of the drone.

get_battery()¶

Get battery percentage.

get_location()¶

Get GPS location of the drone. 500 is unavailable.

get_picture()¶

Get the last taken picture of the drone.

get_return_home_delay()¶

Get return home delay time setting.

get_state()¶

Get inner state of the drone.

land()¶

Landing.

navigate(destination)¶

Navigate to given GPS position with specific mode.

navigate_home()¶

Navigate to home position.

Should turn to recharging state and to standby. In Testdrone the procedure is simplified.

resumeState(last_state)¶

Used after reconnection.

setDisconnected()¶

Turn to disconnected state and

Returns:
last state, like “HEADING”,
for resuming state.
Return type:last_state
setVerbose()¶

Set drone to verbose, printing more info for debugging.

set_location(destination)¶

Set self location. Only used for testdrone.

shut_down()¶

Shut down the drone.

start_video()¶

Start video recording.

stop_video()¶

Stop video recording.

take_off()¶

Take off.

take_picture()¶

Ask drone to take a picture.

update_state()¶

Update inner state.

Testdrones update battery whenever this function called. Also heading to destination.

class TestDrones.TestDiscovery¶

Bases: Drone.Discovery

Derived class for discovering testing drones.

connectToDevice(assignedID, deviceName=None, deviceType='Bebop')¶

Connect to a device with assigned ID or device name.

Returns:A connected drone. else: False.
Return type:If Success
reconnectToDevice(assignedID)¶

Reconnect to given divice.

Used by mananger when disconnected.

searchAllDevices()¶

Search all devices.

Returns:A dictionary for all devices.
TestDrones.readPickle(filename)¶

Read from the testing data.

Would not be used for production.

TestDrones.writePickle(filename, content)¶

Write the testing data.

Would not be used for production.
